doc.field: New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters

Underwriting of a microfilming project. Underwriting of a cooperative effort to collect photostat images of broadsides (The Bailey Gitelson Library of Americana). File includes copies of various issues of "The Chronicle" and "The Magnet," publications of the Gitelson-Kamaiko Foundation. Other topics are also included in the files, including an attempt by Gitelson's daughter, Susan Aurelia Gitelson, with N-YHS's support, to establish an essay contest at Barnard College and Gitelson's attempt (declined) to publish an article in N-YHS's Quarterly.
New-York Historical Society bequests, gifts and related matters
Series I. Bequests to Circa 1960 >> Gitelson, M. Leo (5 folders)
